text: Allahara rahamate'i apani tadera jan'ya komala hrdaya hayechena paksantare apani yadi raga o kathina hrdaya hatena tahale tara apanara kacha theke bicchinna haye yeto. Kaje'i apani tadera ksama kare dina ebam tadera jan'ya magapherata kamana karuna ebam kaje karme tadera paramarsa karuna. Atahpara yakhana kona kajera sid'dhanta grahana kare phelena, takhana allaha taâ€™alara upara bharasa karuna allaha ta'oyakkula karidera bhalabasena.
